text: [Music]
hi i'm miranda borrelli and i play nina
rodriguez in ultraviolet and black
scorpion hi i'm juan alfonso and i play
juan carlos rodriguez an ultraviolet and
black scorpion
means hero in spanish and edward is a
superhero someone who changes somebody
else's life for the better i grew up in
santo domingo in dominican republic and
we came to the states when i was nine
the courage that my mother and my dad
had to leave everything they knew and
come out here with two boys one on the
way i would describe my mom as just
selfless all the love that she poured
into our lives and anyone else my
grandma is mierue and she was a novelist
daring a rebel with a smile at a time
where women weren't really allowed to
speak out and to really say how they
feel they were really censored she
always managed somehow to be able to
tell her truth she inspired me to be
authentic to say the way i felt if my
mom was on the show and she was a
superhero her name would literally be
ultra love i feel like she would just
shoot love out of her fingers of anyone
that she came across her superhero name
would be ultra adventure those heroes
really push you forward and remind you
who you really are the reason why i'm
here today is because of her hi mom
fine an airway in your own life these
are our airways be an airway to someone
else hispanic latinx heritage month eros
celebrate them on disney channel
